text:
MTDCNC (2016–Present) represents the longest and most technically diverse role in Jof Davies’s career. Responsibilities span video production, livestream engineering, email development, CRM architecture, workflow automation, systems design, training, and global ingest pipeline engineering.

Across MTDCNC, Jof:
- Built large-scale automation systems
- Engineered global ingest + proxy workflows for 20+ remote editors
- Designed CRM automations with 75% conversion for hot leads
- Created extensive email development frameworks sending approximately one million emails per month
- Implemented multi-step video publishing automation pipelines
- Acted as livestream director, operator, and technical engineer across international events

This chunk introduces the broader MTDCNC section, with details expanded in subsequent chunks.
